overview:
Ian Milbourn is a founding partner at Notion and is its Chief Financial Officer and Company Secretary. Ian focuses on supporting the financial, legal and commercial operations for portfolio companies.

Ian has a wealth of experience in corporate finance having led a number of key transactions during his career to date. He is a qualified accountant and started his career at Ernst & Young working for their entrepreneurial services division, before moving to their M&A teams specialising in mid-market transactions. Whilst at Ernst & Young, Ian worked with a wide range of early to mid-stage growth businesses spanning a variety of industry sectors.
